I broke them by dropping them off my head too many times in one day (it was a day). I ordered this double pack: I keep a pair in my car, and a pair in my bag. FLORIDA: Gotta protect my eyeballs! And what better way than these super cute sunglasses? Alsooooo look at all the colors you can get!!!!
